structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Nationality Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of nationality categories including Greek citizens, EU nationals, and other foreign nationals for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Greek
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons with Greek nationality or citizenship.

structure:Code.common:Name: EU country
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons with nationality from European Union member countries.

structure:Code.common:Name: Other
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons with nationality from non-EU countries or other foreign nationalities.
